name: Tail Slide to Infinity Tumbling
description: Tail Slide or Deep Stall directly connected into an Infinite Tumbling. The Tail Slide/Deep Stall must not necessarily be long but shall be entered from either straight flying or from the exit of another trick.

criterias.normal: Rhythm, flow, trajectory (no roll movement), tension in the lines and glider, duration, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: Twisted on the entry, untwist after the Tail Slide/Deep Stall and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling without twist
criterias.full twisted: Twisted on the entry, stay twisted after the Tail Slide/Deep Stall and proceed into the Infinity Tumbling twisted and untwist at exit (not during the turns)
criterias.twisted exit: stay twisted during the exit of the Infinity Tumbling
criterias.devil twist: from a twisted situation, change of twist direction (within one turn)

connection: Forbidden connection to Tumbling or Anti-Rhythmic SAT
